name: Saviour (DefinitelyNOTStefan)
description:
What The Game Is:
Saviour is a short platformer combined with a quiz system at the end of the game. You journey through 4 different levels before finishing off with a 4 question quiz about the facts you have learnt over the game.
What To Do:
All you have to do is finish the platformer levels to save children and learn facts. Then you can also play the quiz.
Controls:
"A" and the left arrow make you go left, "D" and the right arrow make you go right, press spacebar to jump and the Escape button to close the application.
Facts:
Child Rights Were Invented In The 19th Century.
The Convention On The Rights Of A Child Has 54 Articles.
Child Rights Are Not Fully Implemented In All Countries.
The First Child Rights Were Called Minors Rights.
